headline: CFG.PR.I: A 6.5% Fixed-Rate Reset Preferred IPO From Citizens Financial
summary: CFG-I preferred offers a 6.5% yield with strong dividend coverage. Stable credit rating and potential rate reset in 2030 add appeal.
